Package com.bomber7.utils

Class ComponentsUtils

java.lang.Object
com.bomber7.utils.ComponentsUtils
public final class ComponentsUtils extends Object
Utility class for enhancing UI components with additional behaviors.

This class is non-instantiable and provides only static helper methods.

  • Method Details

    • addSoundEffect

      public static com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.ClickListener addSoundEffect(com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.ClickListener original)
      Wraps an existing ClickListener to add a click sound effect when the user presses down on a component.

      The original listener's behavior is preserved, and the sound is played via the provided ResourceManager using the SoundType.CLICK sound type.

      Parameters:
      original - the original ClickListener to wrap.
      Returns:
      a new ClickListener that adds a sound effect to the touchDown event, while delegating all events to the original listener.

    • getTintedDrawable

      public static com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.Drawable getTintedDrawable(ResourceManager resources, String color)
      Returns a new drawable tinted with the specified color from the skin.
      Parameters:
      resources - the resource manager that provides access to the skin
      color - the name of the color defined in the skin
      Returns:
      a new Drawable tinted with the specified color
